channel.title: LIGHTS GO OUT AFTER GETTING SHOTGUN
channel.description: Hello, forum. I was playing through and I had just gotten the shotgun and opened the silo door. I went down the elevator and got walked down the hall, rather than getting on the tram. I got to the pool of toxic waste and i jumped down the ladder and all of the lighting goes out. I tried my flashlight, and I could hear it turning on, but no light. I could only see by the light of my mussel flashes, and that's not exactly ideal. Could someone help? Thanks.

item.title: LIGHTS GO OUT AFTER GETTING SHOTGUN
item.dc:creator: AgentPsychopath
item.description:
lexa2:

Could you please elaborate on which solution among two I had posted above works for you?

Ok, I used the one where I put the game_shader_dx9.dll in Backup from bin. That caused white lines to cross the bottom and right side of the screen, as well as across diagonally from the top left to the bottom right. Then I tried doing both solutions (placing bth game_shader_dx9.dll in a Backup and bms_postprocess_ps20b.vcs in a Backup) and got the same problem. Then, I tried just using bms_postprocess_ps20b.vcs but I got the blackout problem.
